Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Didja bring all the materials for
the renovation?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? Don't have 'em all yet?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen, to do the renovation, you'll need:
<BLUE>15 Small Lumber</BLUE> and <BLUE>15 Small Stones</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
Once you get those together, we'll get right on
it. Just let me know.
